menu.name: Chef's Specialties
menu.description: Served With Soup, Appetizer, and Steamed or Fried Rice.

items.name: 1. Greenshell Mussels
items.description: With black bean sauce or Szechuan sauce. Served with soup, appetizer and choice of rice.

items.name: 2. Calamari
items.description: With black bean or pepper sauce. Served with soup, appetizer and choice of rice.

items.name: 3. Happy Family
items.description: Chicken, beef, shrimp and scallops stir fried with baby corn, water chestnuts, mushrooms and broccoli in a house special sauce. Served with soup, appetizer and choice of rice.

items.description: Beef, chicken, shrimp with green onions and yellow onion. Served with soup, appetizer and choice of rice.

items.description: Served with soup, appetizer and choice of rice.

items.description: Shrimp, scallops, crab meat and vegetables. Served with soup, appetizer and choice of rice.

items.name: 8. Lobster and Scallops
items.description: Lobster tail and scallops stir fried with vegetables in a creamy white sauce. Served with soup, appetizer and choice of rice.

items.name: 9. Dragon Boat Special Plate for 2
items.description: Delicious mixture of lobster tail, scallops, beef, shrimp and tender boneless chicken, stir fried with vegetables and sauteed in our chef's special sauce. Served with soup, appetizer and choice of rice.

review.review_text: Unfortunately I thought the sushi was very average. It didn't taste bad, but it didn't taste great either.
When I came back for another try, I wss less impressed than the first time. I tried the white mountain roll and the whute tuna on top wasn't...
The sushi is fresh and the choices are plenty. I came for all the you can eat sushi for lunch, and I can barely move because I gorged myself...
Very good place. On business travel and had a craving for Sushi. Lots of choices on the menu and the Rockies Roll was excellant. Best hot n ...
